mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quotation_board (post_id, expert_id, category_id, state) VALUES (#{postId}, #{expertId}, #{categoryId}, #{state})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT qb.post_id, qb.expert_id, qb.category_id, qb.state, b.title, b.content, b.created_at, b.user_nickname, b.userid, l.location_id, l.city, l.district FROM quotation_board qb JOIN board b ON qb.post_id = b.post_id JOIN quotation_location ql ON ql.post_id = qb.post_id JOIN location l ON l.location_id = ql.location_id WHERE qb.category_id IN ( SELECT ec.category_id FROM expert_category ec WHERE ec.user_id = #{userid} ) AND ql.location_id IN ( SELECT el.location_id FROM expert_location el WHERE el.user_id = #{userid} ) ORDER BY qb.post_id, l.location_id

SELECT qb.post_id AS POST_ID, qb.expert_id AS EXPERT_ID, qb.category_id AS CATEGORY_ID, qb.state AS STATE, b.title AS TITLE, b.content AS CONTENT, b.created_at AS CREATED_AT, b.user_nickname AS USER_NICKNAME, b.userid AS USERID, l.location_id AS LOCATION_ID, l.city AS CITY, l.district AS DISTRICT FROM quotation_board qb JOIN board b ON qb.post_id = b.post_id LEFT JOIN quotation_location ql ON b.post_id = ql.post_id LEFT JOIN location l ON ql.location_id = l.location_id WHERE qb.post_id = #{postId}
